ThingDef.label: Covenant Beam Rifle
ThingDef.description: The Type-50 Sniper Rifle System,otherwise known as the Particle Beam Rifle, is a Covenant long-range weapon and the counterpart of the UNSC Sniper Rifle. They are most commonly seen being used by Kig-Yar, although Sangheili and even Jiralhanae are also seen using Beam Rifles on occasion.

ThingDef.label: Covenant Carbine
ThingDef.description: The Type-51 Carbine is a Covenant recoil-operated and charger-fed, semi-automatic weapon. The Type-51 Carbine serves as the Covenant's medium to long-range weapon and fires an 8mm caseless radioactive projectile.

ThingDef.label: Covenant Plasma Rifle
ThingDef.description: The Type-25 Directed Energy Rifle, a.k.a the "Plasma Rifle" is the standard issue weapon for Covenant Elites of all rank. It fires bolts of superheated, ionized gas that causes desvastating damage to organic and inorganic materials alike, leaving at worst, numerous third degree burns.

ThingDef.label: Covenant Plasma Repeater
ThingDef.description: The Type-51 Directed Energy Rifle/Improved (T51 DER/I), more commonly known as the plasma repeater, is a plasma-based directed energy weapon used by the Covenant, issued to Sangheili as well as Jiralhanae shock troops.

ThingDef.label: Covenant Plasma Pistol
ThingDef.description: The Type-25 Directed Energy Pistol,also known as the Plasma Pistol, is a Covenant infantry firearm commonly wielded by the smaller Covenant member species, such as the Unggoy, Kig-Yar, and the Yanme'e.

ThingDef.label: Brute Plasma Pistol
ThingDef.description: The Type-25 Directed Energy Pistol,also known as the Plasma Pistol, is a Covenant infantry firearm commonly wielded by the smaller Covenant member species, such as the Unggoy, Kig-Yar, and the Yanme'e. This variant has been modified by the Brutes, slighty altering it's function.

ThingDef.label: Covenant Needler
ThingDef.description: The Type-33 Guided Munitions Launcher is a highly effective anti-personel weapons given to all ranks of Covenant. The weapon uses a very ill understood source of ammo and payload dispersal, and attempts to recreate it outside of the Lodam Armory have been unable to reproduce it's iconic, "supercombine" effect. Even so, the weapon is still increddibly affective against most targets, save for those with the thickest hides. Due to the nature of its projecticle, energy shielding is largely ineffective against the Needler's needles.

ThingDef.label: Brute Shredder
ThingDef.description: The Type-25 Munitions Launcher, also known as the Shredder, is a Covenant Anti-Infantry Weapon. It is used by Brute Followers, Brute Leaders and Spec-Ops Jackals. Unlike it's purple counter-part the unrefined nature of it's crystals prevents it from homing in on targets.

ThingDef.label: Brute Plasma Rifle
ThingDef.description: The Type-25J Directed Energy Rifle, is a modified version of the standard Plasma Rifle favored by the Brutes. Called the "Blood-Hand" this version sports a deep red coloration, and features and accelerated rate of fire at the cost of overheating much more easily. Much like the Brutes, this weapon is vicous and rips and tears its way though flesh without hesitation...

ThingDef.label: Brute Mauler
ThingDef.description: The Type-52 Mauler is used by the Jiralhanae as a handgun, although human military experts have classified it as being more of a handheld shotgun than anything else. The magazine holds 5 7.9mm metal bolts, which appear to be constantly kept at superheated temperatures before being fired. These bolts appear to fragment upon being ejected from the weapon, creating a scatter-shot effect reminiscent of human shotguns. Like all Jiralhanae weapons, the Mauler is equipped with a small blade underneath, making it a formidable melee weapon.

ThingDef.label: Brute Shot
ThingDef.description: The Type-25 Grenade Launcher is a Brute-crafted semi-automatic ballistic launcher capable of firing up to six fragmentation rounds at a target. Against unshielded infantry, the Brute Shot is extremely effective, and while it canâ€™t generally destroy a vehicle upon impact, it can knock one over, making its now unprotected passengers vulnerable.

ThingDef.label: Brute Spiker
ThingDef.description: The Type-25 Carbine is an automatic projectile weapon designed and used by the Jiralhanae, and has seen very little iteration since it was first designed and implemented during pre-Covenant conflicts on Doisac though it has seen augmentation to some degree by Covenant technology. In the Covenant arsenal, it is one of the weapons most resembling those developed and employed by humanity, firing a solid metal projectile as opposed to plasma.

ThingDef.label: Covenant Needle Rifle
ThingDef.description: The Type-31 Rifle fires unconventional, long and sharp projectiles similar to those of the Needler. The projectiles detonate several seconds after impacting on soft tissue. Like the Needler, if enough needles are fired into a target, a supercombine explosion occurs. Except this blueprint seems to be incorrect, as said supercombine effect seems to not occur here.

ThingDef.label: Concussion Rifle
ThingDef.description: The Type-50 Directed Energy Rifle/Heavy (T50 DER/H), commonly known as the Concussion Rifle, is a Covenant infantry weapon. The general design of the Concussion Rifle was engineered by a group of Sangheili merchants from Qikost long before the signing of the Writ of Union; when the Sangheili joined the Covenant, the Concussion Rifle entered service within the hegemony. Though the physical configuration of the weapon has changed over the millennia, its function has remained the same.

ThingDef.label: fuel Rod Gun
ThingDef.description: The M41 Surface-to-Surface Rocket Medium Anti-Vehicle/Assault Weapon formally known as the Medium Anti-Vehicle / Assault Weapon, Bore 102mm, M41 Surface-to-Surface Rocket Launcher, and commonly known as the Rocket Launcher or the SPNKr Rocket Launcher, is a heavy ordnance weapon of the UNSC arsenal.
